speaker: CAIUS LUCIUS
text_entry: SCENE III. Another part of the field.

speaker: CAIUS LUCIUS
text_entry: Enter POSTHUMUS LEONATUS and a British Lord

speaker: Lord
text_entry: Camest thou from where they made the stand?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I did.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Though you, it seems, come from the fliers.

speaker: Lord
text_entry: I did.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: No blame be to you, sir; for all was lost,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: But that the heavens fought: the king himself

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Of his wings destitute, the army broken,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And but the backs of Britons seen, all flying

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Through a straight lane; the enemy full-hearted,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Lolling the tongue with slaughtering, having work

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: More plentiful than tools to do't, struck down

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Some mortally, some slightly touch'd, some falling

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Merely through fear; that the straight pass was damm'd

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: With dead men hurt behind, and cowards living

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To die with lengthen'd shame.

speaker: Lord
text_entry: Where was this lane?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Close by the battle, ditch'd, and wall'd with turf;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Which gave advantage to an ancient soldier,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: An honest one, I warrant; who deserved

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: So long a breeding as his white beard came to,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: In doing this for's country: athwart the lane,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: He, with two striplings-lads more like to run

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The country base than to commit such slaughter

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: With faces fit for masks, or rather fairer

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Than those for preservation cased, or shame--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Made good the passage; cried to those that fled,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: 'Our Britain s harts die flying, not our men:

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To darkness fleet souls that fly backwards. Stand;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Or we are Romans and will give you that

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Like beasts which you shun beastly, and may save,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: But to look back in frown: stand, stand.'

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: These three,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Three thousand confident, in act as many--

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: For three performers are the file when all

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The rest do nothing--with this word 'Stand, stand,'

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Accommodated by the place, more charming

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: With their own nobleness, which could have turn'd

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: A distaff to a lance, gilded pale looks,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Part shame, part spirit renew'd; that some,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: turn'd coward

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: But by example--O, a sin in war,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Damn'd in the first beginners!--gan to look

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The way that they did, and to grin like lions

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Upon the pikes o' the hunters. Then began

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: A stop i' the chaser, a retire, anon

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: A rout, confusion thick; forthwith they fly

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Chickens, the way which they stoop'd eagles; slaves,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The strides they victors made: and now our cowards,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Like fragments in hard voyages, became

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The life o' the need: having found the backdoor open

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Of the unguarded hearts, heavens, how they wound!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Some slain before; some dying; some their friends

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: O'er borne i' the former wave: ten, chased by one,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Are now each one the slaughter-man of twenty:

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Those that would die or ere resist are grown

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The mortal bugs o' the field.

speaker: Lord
text_entry: This was strange chance

speaker: Lord
text_entry: A narrow lane, an old man, and two boys.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Nay, do not wonder at it: you are made

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Rather to wonder at the things you hear

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Than to work any. Will you rhyme upon't,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And vent it for a mockery? Here is one:

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: 'Two boys, an old man twice a boy, a lane,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Preserved the Britons, was the Romans' bane.'

speaker: Lord
text_entry: Nay, be not angry, sir.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: 'Lack, to what end?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Who dares not stand his foe, I'll be his friend;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: For if he'll do as he is made to do,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: I know he'll quickly fly my friendship too.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: You have put me into rhyme.

speaker: Lord
text_entry: Farewell; you're angry.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Still going?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Exit Lord

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: This is a lord! O noble misery,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To be i' the field, and ask 'what news?' of me!

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To-day how many would have given their honours

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: To have saved their carcasses! took heel to do't,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: And yet died too! I, in mine own woe charm'd,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Could not find death where I did hear him groan,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Nor feel him where he struck: being an ugly monster,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: 'Tis strange he hides him in fresh cups, soft beds,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Sweet words; or hath more ministers than we

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: That draw his knives i' the war. Well, I will find him

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: For being now a favourer to the Briton,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: No more a Briton, I have resumed again

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: The part I came in: fight I will no more,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: But yield me to the veriest hind that shall

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Once touch my shoulder. Great the slaughter is

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Here made by the Roman; great the answer be

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Britons must take. For me, my ransom's death;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: On either side I come to spend my breath;

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Which neither here I'll keep nor bear again,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: But end it by some means for Imogen.

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Enter two British Captains and Soldiers

speaker: First Captain
text_entry: Great Jupiter be praised! Lucius is taken.

speaker: First Captain
text_entry: 'Tis thought the old man and his sons were angels.

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: There was a fourth man, in a silly habit,

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: That gave the affront with them.

speaker: First Captain
text_entry: So 'tis reported:

speaker: First Captain
text_entry: But none of 'em can be found. Stand! who's there?

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: A Roman,

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Who had not now been drooping here, if seconds

speaker: POSTHUMUS LEONATUS
text_entry: Had answer'd him.

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: Lay hands on him; a dog!

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: A leg of Rome shall not return to tell

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: What crows have peck'd them here. He brags

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: his service

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: As if he were of note: bring him to the king.

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: Enter CYMBELINE, BELARIUS, GUIDERIUS, ARVIRAGUS,  PISANIO, Soldiers, Attendants, and Roman Captives.  The Captains present POSTHUMUS LEONATUS to  CYMBELINE, who delivers him over to a Gaoler: then exeunt omnes

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: SCENE IV. A British prison.

speaker: Second Captain
text_entry: Enter POSTHUMUS LEONATUS and two Gaolers
